name: Alternative Rooster Feathers (10 per pack) Buy 10 Packs get 2 FREE
description:
For Every 10 Packs you Buy, get 2 packs FREE!

For every "pack" of Alternative Rooster Feather Extensions sold we will donate $1 to Locks of Love! Thank you all for helping us have the opportunity to Help this Amazing Organization! 


We have designed a humane, cruelty free and environment friendly alternative. We have commissioned a 
animal cruelty free and humane manufacturing partner to create a "grizzly rooster pattern" hair extension.
These are made from a hybrid synthetic hair extension.
A great alternative to the killing of roosters! 

These extensions are 15 inches in length, feature i tip attachments for easy installation, and can be safely washed, curled , crimped and ironed. ***Safe MAX Temp 330 degrees***

These do not have a spine like the rooster so "dramatic curls" may not be achieved, perfect for cutting and adding texture with a razor as well as adding product can make for many custom looks.

10 different colors featuring the grizzly rooster pattern.

name: Hair Royalty Logo Back Pack
description:
Hair Royalty Logo Backpack- Perfect for all your hair tools on the go, your laptop, or as a overnight bag.

The backpack has been a symbol of academia for decades. Their convenient design that allows students to carry books, notebooks, pens, papers and other miscellaneous accessories has made this one of the most important tools in a student’s repertoire. However, students are now learning primarily through electronic mediums and schools along with the world are becoming more tech-savvy and moving away from traditional means of education. Student’s tools like pens, paper, books and backpacks must keep up with the changing times. The Collegiate Backpack does a great job meeting the needs of contemporary education while keeping the hallmark designs that backpacks have had for years. You wouldn’t know it from looking at this seemingly standard backpack but it has features that can accommodate a tech-savvy student like additional pockets for technology, enough room for a laptop and strong yet comfortable straps. Backpacks have the lofty task of carrying everything you may need for your daily scholastic activities from books to snacks while remaining stylish and casual in design. These Collegiate Backpacks are ideal for those seeking an item that emphasizes both style and efficiency. Their many features and casual style are made possible by concealed compartments and features that are built in to the design of the bag which makes it sleek and simple. These Collegiate Backpacks are made of polyester, woven reinforced handles, padded adjustable shoulder straps, large main zipper compartment and an extremely convenient side mesh pocket

Measurement- 17"H x 12.5"W x 3.75"G
Material-Polyester
